basics.name: Yusuke Mori
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I was born on 22th July 1986 and was raised in Japan. I was interested in mathematics since I was in high school and I studied mathematics at university. I went on to graduate school as it was and got my master's degree in graph theory. After graduating from the graduate school, I began to work as the quants, I built and implemented a pricing model for financial derivative products using stochastic differential equations. Currently I quit the bank and work as a CTO at Handii. I love programming and mathematics, and I often spend my weekend reading books with my family at the cafe.

work.summary: We believe that a technology makes life rich. But it is too diffucult for many people to use with easy and we will realize the world that anyone can easily utilize technology. We develope application for our rich lives.
highlights: Developing iOS application for support comfortable training life.

work.summary: I worked as a quants. Quants is a person who specializes in the application of mathematical and statistical methods - such as numerical or quantitative techniques â€“ to financial and risk management problems.
highlights: Study mathematical finance and monte carlo simulation.
Developing tha core library for calculating the bond risk mangement system.
Developing the library for automatic differentiation.
